Reviews.Title: SUPER easy install. Great camera.
Reviews.Author: Coinhunter "Gman"
Reviews.Content: I can't figure out what the other guy who wrote a review is talking about. If you can connect a Red, Black, and White male plug to a Red, Black, White female plug then this is perhaps the easiest device to install even if your a monkey. Seriously, it works great, good quality, good price, includes long wires, everything you need for a 10 minute install. Quick shipping. I have 3 of these and they work great day and night outdoors.

Reviews.Title: Never could get to work
Reviews.Author: Thomas O. Klomps
Reviews.Content: I have tried for months to get this Audio / Video Camera to work.  The Audio never did work and the video was always way off compared to all the other cameras on my security system.  Was a total waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Not impressed
Reviews.Author: T. Gray
Reviews.Content: The camera has a very poor mounting swivel which won't tighten enough to keep it in position. Image etc not great. I know it was cheap but not even worth the money. Pass on this one.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Audio Video Outdoor Day Night Vision 520TVL IR-Cut Filter...
Reviews.Author: Sergey Davydov
Reviews.Content: To be honestly audio doesn't work at all. Quality 7 of 10. I don't like it. But you can try maybe it will be good for you.

Reviews.Title: Its good
Reviews.Author: screps
Reviews.Content: It seems to work just fine, all you do is plug into a tv. plenty or wire comes with it for me. Picture is nice, my kids played with it pretending to be movie stars. Until I mounted it outside and ran the wire. Now they want one of their own to play with..

Reviews.Title: Just Fair
Reviews.Author: Capt512
Reviews.Content: Purchased this and was surprised how poor the night vision is. Bracket poorly designed and difficult to tighten securly.Daytime video good as well as audio. However would NOT buy again.

Reviews.Title: cameras work
Reviews.Author: Robert Pritchard
Reviews.Content: I ordered five of the cameras and four are still working perfectly night vision is great and during the daylight hours they work with extreme clairity the one quit within the first week so I have ordered three more to have as backups for my system if the one had not quit the first week it would be five star rated

Reviews.Title: Works Great
Reviews.Author: Dana Cramer
Reviews.Content: Works great, The night vision flickers but that don't bother me. I really like the corded cameras. They work better then the wireless ones.

Reviews.Title: seen 5 Bears
Reviews.Author: wilddeer
Reviews.Content: Works very well better then camra that I pad more for the night vision i went to turn the lights out side ther were no  lights on could see out to 75ft out in KY at dark if your looking for a good camra you can't do much better for the money

Reviews.Title: can't beat it
Reviews.Author: Joe
Reviews.Content: works really good, has good color in day and a fairly nice night vision (b&w;) I have added 4 two replace my standard 420 q-see ones in the last year & im very happy....wire,trans & camera in 60.00 range is best so far for me.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: jr37660
Reviews.Content: Works great is clear and wide view.At night I thought it wouldnt be that good but I was wrong it looks as good as day time.Worth every penny. Thanks

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: J. Hastings
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is good for the price.  However, the instructions to install were terrible.  It is a newer camera for an older system.  It was hard figuring out how to adapt.  The diagram on the instructions did not show the camera that was sent and did not have areas that were shown.  If it was like the pictures, it would have been much easier to install.  Once I figured out what to do (thanks to Radio Shack employee that knew what adapters to try) and I got it installed, the camera is great.  Very clear, the night time vision is real clear and good.  I'm not sure how easy it is to install with a newer system, but once installed you would be very happy with it.

ProductInfo.Features:
Affordable day night color audio video CMOS security camera. Horizontal Resolution: 520 TV lines
36 infrared leds for night vision. NTSC signal system. Built-in audio microphone
Minimum Illumination: 0.0 Lux(with IR on). Lens: 6.0mm. Built-in mechanical IR-Cut filter switch
Built-in light sensor controls IR activation. Metal body housing, mount and sun shade
Packages included: 1 x audio video bullet camera, 1 x 12V DC 500mA power supply, 1 x audio video power extension cable and 1 of security warning decal
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Audio Video Outdoor Day Night Vision 520TVL IR-Cut Filter Infrared Bullet Security Camera Home CCTV Surveillance with Power Supply and Audio Video Power Cable IR809AS C4P
